content: In the initial prompt system instructions, replace "macOS" with a placeholder. Then when those instructions are getting ready to be sent the LLM, replace the placeholder with the current system the app is running on.
On my MacBook Air it put in "Darwin" for system type. Is that right? Shouldn't it say like "MacOS" or something?
It's replacing "[SYSTEM_TYPE]" for the initial messages sent to the LLM ("chat" endpoint), but not when sending user replies (chat-with-images endpoint).
